description: A next-generation Web3 wallet that enables secure, multi-chain asset management, dApp interaction, token swapping, staking, and learning via an integrated educational system. Built for users and developers alike.

Build With Tychi Wallet.description: Resources and SDKs for developers and businesses to build on the Tychi ecosystem.

Wallet Core.description: Open-source crypto wallet library built for flexibility, security, and multi-chain compatibility.
features: Multi-chain wallet engine with abstracted logic
Built-in staking, DEX integration, and gas fee estimation

Submit dApp.description: Launch your decentralized app directly on Tychi Wallet and gain exposure to a global audience.

Asset Listing.description: List tokens on Tychi Wallet with support for custom metadata, branding, and gas fee optimization.

features: Universal Gas Fee Optimization using TYI or BNB

Technology.overview: A decentralized architecture built using cutting-edge tools and open protocols.

benefits: Cross-chain token transfers with minimal slippage

Security Measures: Biometric login support (Face ID, Touch ID)

Universal Gas Fee Flexibility.description: Users can choose gas tokens across supported chains and convert via backend rate oracle.

Debit Card Integration.description: Crypto-to-fiat debit system backed by partner banks and Visa/Mastercard.
features: Instant crypto-fiat conversion at point of sale

Multi-Chain Management.description: Unified interface for all your blockchain accounts.

Education.description: Learn Web3 concepts and earn TYI tokens while doing so.
features: Courses on DeFi, NFTs, Smart Contracts

Cookie Policy.description: Explains how cookies are used for functionality, analytics, and personalization.

onboarding: Create Wallet or Import via Seed Phrase
Optional KYC for fiat card activation

sections.Tagline: Start Building the Future with Tychi Wallet Today!

Mobile App.description: Experience the full power of Web3 on the go with the Tychi Wallet mobile app.
features: Gas fee payments using TYI Token or BNB
Cold storage and advanced features like staking, token swapping, and family wallets
Mobile App.tagline: Experience Web3 mobility with top-notch security and user-friendly design!

Browser Extension.description: Optimized Web3 experience for desktop users through a secure browser extension.
features: Flexible gas fee payments in TYI or BNB
Security-first integration for safe Web3 interactions
Browser Extension.tagline: Unlock the full potential of Web3 on your desktop with Tychi Wallet!

Partnerships.philosophy: Collaboration drives innovation. Tychi Wallet actively builds meaningful partnerships to shape a thriving Web3 ecosystem.

Established Projects: Get your token or asset listed in Tychi Wallet
New Projects: Access to Wallet Core—open-source crypto wallet library

current_partners: BNB Greenfield for decentralized data storage
Partnerships.call_to_action: Be part of our growing ecosystem and start collaborating today.

White Paper Overview.description: Detailed overview of Tychi Wallet's white paper, including its core architecture, problems addressed, technologies used, and significance to the Web3 ecosystem.
topics: Problems Addressed (Asset Management, Safety, UX, Compatibility)

design_overview.summary: Tychi Wallet addresses Web3 usability challenges through features like multi-chain support, decentralized ID, cold storage, and unique tokenomics, offering a safe and user-friendly experience.

design_goals.accessibility: Simplifies Web3 tech for mass adoption.
design_goals.scalability: Built to accommodate future blockchain integrations.
design_goals.decentralization: Users retain complete control over assets and identities.

notion.description: Tychi Wallet is a hybrid solution that blends decentralized security with the flexibility of centralized platforms. It uses advanced cryptographic algorithms for user data and payment protection.

multi_chain_bridging.description: Allows easy token exchange across 50+ chains using secure smart contracts and blockchain bridges.
process: User selects source and destination chains.
Tokens are locked on source chain.
Target chain mints/releases equal value using Merkle proofs and cryptographic signatures.
Automated liquidity pools reduce transfer delay and ensure reliability.

gas_fee_optimization.description: Enables gas fee payment with TYI or BNB via a fee abstraction mechanism.
process: System converts to required native token.
Smart contracts handle conversion using liquidity pools.
Eliminates need to hold various native tokens, reducing cost and complexity.

social_recovery.description: Implements decentralized recovery using trusted contacts and Shamir's Secret Sharing.
process: Recovery request is split and encrypted.
Parts sent to pre-approved guardians with cryptographic IDs.
Minimum confirmations required for private key reconstruction.

measures: Smart Contract Audits to find and fix vulnerabilities.
Cold Storage for secure, long-term asset storage.
Redundancy through backup mechanisms for reliability.
Fraud Detection via AI-based anomaly detection systems.

multi_chain_asset_management.overview: Manage assets on 50+ blockchains via a single interface, simplifying transfers, swaps, and staking.

technical_design.blockchain_bridges: Locks tokens on source chain and mints equivalent on target using cryptographic proofs.
technical_design.smart_contracts: Automates cross-chain processes with secure execution.
technical_design.liquidity_management: Ensures fast asset transfers using automated liquidity pools.
technical_design.real_time_validation: Decentralized relay network prevents double-spending or invalid transfers.

gas_fee_flexibility.overview: Users pay gas fees using TYI or BNB instead of native tokens.

technical_engineering.fee_abstraction_layer: Real-time conversion of TYI/BNB to native tokens via smart contracts.
workflow: Smart contracts evaluate gas fees and initiate swap.
Transaction executed with converted native tokens.
System tracks gas fee fluctuations for savings.

Cold Wallet Storage (Paid Premium Featur.overview: Secure assets offline with three-factor authentication.

features: Private keys are stored on a hardware device.
Encrypted with AES-256 encryption and protected by a unique PIN code.
Three-factor authentication: Password or PIN, Biometric verification, OTP through Google Authenticator.
Uses distributed storage solutions such as IPFS.
Private keys are fragmented and stored using Shamir's Secret Sharing.
Retrieval requires threshold authentication from multiple nodes.
Private keys exported and stored on an encrypted USB drive.
Accessible only via Tychi Wallet's proprietary decryption software.
Tamper-proof hardware to prevent unauthorized access.

Key Components.Smart Contract-Based Guardianship: Custom smart contract ensures transparency, security, and tamper-proof operations.
Key Components.Trusted Guardians: Designated individuals/entities with unique cryptographic identifiers.
Key Components.Shamir's Secret Sharing Algorithm: Splits private key into fragments requiring threshold for reconstruction.
Key Components.Encrypted Fragments: Each fragment encrypted and distributed among guardians.

Recovery Process: Smart contract reconstructs and returns encrypted private key.

Decentralized Identity Wallet.overview: Enables secure, self-sovereign identity management using DIDs and cryptographic proofs.

Decentralized Verifiable Credentials (VC: Store and verify credentials like degrees or licenses.
Signed by issuers and verifiable without third parties.

Storage Architecture.Off-Chain: Stores encrypted VCs in IPFS or Arweave.

Key Management: HD wallets for secure identity key handling.
Privacy Features: Selective disclosure for controlled data sharing.

Educational Wallet.overview: Empowers users to learn Web3 with in-wallet learning modules, quizzes, and rewards.

Learning Modules.Content: Topics like DeFi, NFTs, staking, etc.

Interactive Quizzes.Gamified: Rewards in TYI tokens or NFTs.

Video Integration: Hosted on decentralized networks like IPFS.

Family/Group Wallet.overview: Enables shared asset management with role-based controls for families, teams, or communities.

Smart Contract Enforcement: Rules for votes and permission checks.

Subscription-Based Wallet.overview: Access premium features via tiered subscriptions with on-chain payment verification.

Cold Wallet Service Integration: Extras: analytics tools, priority support, exclusive staking.

Gamified Wallet.overview: Adds rewards and milestone incentives for engaging with wallet features and learning content.

technical_design.Incentive Tokens: Smart contracts track activities and distribute reward tokens.
technical_design.NFT Integration: Exclusive NFTs for learning and staking milestones.
technical_design.Airdrops: Periodic distributions based on activity frequency.
Backend Architecture: Decentralized database for user progress and leaderboards.

Staking Capabilities.overview: Allows users to stake supported tokens through a simplified UI for passive income, including single-asset and liquidity pool staking.

Staking Pools Integration.description: Wallet connects via APIs and smart contracts to staking pools.
Staking Pools Integration.functionality: Rewards are distributed proportionally to user contributions.

DeFi Protocols Integration.benefits: Users earn both staking incentives and transaction fees.

Auto-Compounding.description: Optional feature that reinvests rewards to maximize APY automatically.

Token Swapping.overview: Enables cross-chain and same-chain token swaps within the wallet using liquidity pools and bridges.

Liquidity Pools.routing_algorithm: Finds optimal swap routes for best rates and minimal slippage

features: Displays price, liquidity depth, and fees

Debit Card Integration.overview: Premium feature allowing global crypto spending via digital and physical debit cards.

Conversion System.crypto_to_fiat: Supports multiple fiat currencies based on market rate

Payment Gateway Integration.APIs: Secure integration with merchant payment networks

features: Link with swap profits or wallets

AI Agent Feature.overview: An intelligent trading assistant integrated into Tychi Wallet for premium users.

key_features.Market Sentiment Analysis: Analyzes real-time data from Twitter, Reddit, and forums.
key_features.Exchange Data Integration: Monitors order books, volumes, and trends from major exchanges.
key_features.Customized Recommendations: Token-based guidance tailored to user preferences.
key_features.Risk Assessment: Provides volatility and trend-based risk scoring.
key_features.Interactive Queries: Users ask questions and get actionable answers (e.g., ‘Should I buy ETH now?’).

architecture.Recommendation Layer: Combines all scores to generate personalized insights.
architecture.User Interface Layer: Conversational interface for alerts, reports, and suggestions.

working_flow: User subscribes and selects tokens to track
Agent gathers and processes data continuously
Insights are displayed with alerts and risk analysis

flowchart.Standard Flow: Subscription → Token Selection → Data Processing → Recommendation Delivery
flowchart.Alert Flow: Market Event → Risk Analysis → Notification Sent

benefits: Great for traders, investors, and beginners

Tokenomics.overview: Describes token distribution and supply strategy for the first 4 years.

details.distribution: [To be defined: team, ecosystem, staking, rewards]

milestones.name: Project Initiation
milestones.description: Finalized concept, formed the core team, and conducted competitive market research to identify unique wallet differentiators.

milestones.name: Technical Framework
milestones.description: Architected the wallet's core systems for scalability, security, and multi-chain operability.

milestones.name: Regulatory Compliance
milestones.description: Collaborated with legal advisors to ensure regulatory compliance in the U.S., EU, and APAC regions.

milestones.name: Core Wallet Functions
milestones.description: Developed core wallet capabilities—asset storage, transfers, native token integration, and chain support.

milestones.name: Cold Wallet Integration
milestones.description: Launched three-factor authentication and secure offline storage for enhanced asset safety.

milestones.name: UI/UX Design
milestones.description: Established user-centric design patterns, accessibility, and intuitive onboarding flows.

milestones.name: Beta Release
milestones.description: Released the beta version for internal testers and early users for live feedback.

milestones.name: Smart Contract Foundation
milestones.description: Built secure smart contracts for staking, subscriptions, and wallet logic.

milestones.name: Brand & Awareness
milestones.description: Launched branding and digital marketing campaigns in preparation for the official launch.

milestones.name: Feature Refinement
milestones.description: Improved wallet performance and security based on beta feedback.

milestones.name: Strategic Partnerships
milestones.description: Established cross-chain partnerships with blockchain ecosystems and service providers.

milestones.name: Official Launch
milestones.description: Tychi Wallet 1.0 launched with multi-chain support, staking, token swapping, and cold wallet protection.

milestones.name: Educational Wallet Module
milestones.description: Released integrated blockchain learning with courses, quizzes, videos, and TYI rewards.

milestones.name: Gamified Wallet
milestones.description: Introduced gamified experiences: milestone NFTs, token airdrops, and user activity incentives.

milestones.name: Debit Card Launch
milestones.description: Released crypto-linked debit cards for global payments and wallet fund access.

milestones.name: Premium Features
milestones.description: Launched subscription plans for exclusive staking, cold storage, and early DeFi access.

milestones.name: Social Recovery
milestones.description: Enabled wallet recovery using guardianship protocols via smart contracts and Shamir’s Secret Sharing.

milestones.name: Family/Group Wallets
milestones.description: Enabled shared asset management via multi-sig wallets and permission-based roles.

milestones.name: Decentralized Identity
milestones.description: Launched identity wallets with DID credentials and verifiable proofs.

milestones.name: Token Swap Optimization
milestones.description: Enhanced swap engine with better route finding and bridge integrations.

milestones.name: Security Upgrades
milestones.description: Integrated biometric login, hardware wallet sync, and AI-driven fraud alerts.

milestones.name: Language Support
milestones.description: Added multilingual interface options to boost global adoption.

conclusion.vision: To make Web3 secure, user-friendly, and interoperable for global adoption.
strategic_goals: Empower users with advanced control and recovery
Position Tychi Wallet as a central hub for decentralized finance
conclusion.long_term_impact: Create a seamless, accessible blockchain environment fostering financial empowerment and mainstream participation.

meta.title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Policy
meta.scope: Applies to all users and operations globally

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.description: Outlines TychiWallet’s commitment to detecting, preventing, and reporting financial crimes, in line with international standards.

sections.heading: 2. Regulatory Compliance
sections.description: Specifies adherence to international and national legal frameworks for AML/CTF (Counter-Terrorism Financing).
details: Applicable national AML and CTF laws

sections.heading: 3. Customer Due Diligence (CDD)
sections.description: A multi-level process based on user risk profiling.
requirements: Proof of address (utility bill, lease, etc.)
Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) for high-risk customers

sections.heading: 4. Transaction Monitoring
sections.description: Automated real-time systems flag anomalous activities using behavioral analysis.

sections.heading: 5. Reporting and Record-Keeping
sections.description: Outlines obligations to retain and report financial activity.
measures: Suspicious Activity Reports (SAR) submitted to authorities
Data retention for a minimum of 5 years post-transaction

sections.heading: 6. Risk Assessment and Internal Controls
sections.description: Procedures to assess institutional AML vulnerabilities.
controls: Mandatory employee training on AML practices

sections.heading: 7. Prohibited Activities
activities: Use of stolen or forged identity documents

sections.heading: 8. Enforcement and Compliance
sections.description: Actions TychiWallet may take against policy violations.
actions: Immediate suspension or termination of accounts
Mandatory report filing to regulatory bodies

sections.heading: 9. Amendments
sections.description: The policy is reviewed and revised regularly to reflect evolving compliance standards.

sections.heading: 10. Contact Information
sections.description: For questions or AML-related reporting, contact: compliance@tychiwallet.com

AMLPolicy.disclaimer: This policy aligns with global AML standards. We recommend consulting a legal expert for local regulatory guidance.
